to_if_held_down.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/hs -c 'local ev=require("hs.eventtap"); local t=require("hs.timer"); ev.keyStroke({}, "home"); t.usleep(120000); ev.keyStroke({}, "tab"); t.usleep(120000); ev.keyStroke({}, "end")'

rules.ruleDescription: B hold -> Skim: create anchored note
N hold -> Skim: add extended text to anchored note
CAPS - HSLAUNCHER (alone), HYPER (hold), SUPER (with shift), MEH (with ctrl)
SPACE - tap for space, hold for layer

to.shell_command: /opt/homebrew/bin/hs -c "local indicator = require('karabiner_layer_indicator'); indicator.show('{\"label\":\"A\",\"keys\":[{\"key\":\"8\",\"desc\":\"8x8\"},{\"key\":\"A\",\"desc\":\"Apps\"},{\"key\":\"C\",\"desc\":\"VS Code Insiders\"},{\"key\":\"D\",\"desc\":\"Dia\"},{\"key\":\"F\",\"desc\":\"QSpace Pro\"},{\"key\":\"G\",\"desc\":\"ChatGPT\"},{\"key\":\"M\",\"desc\":\"Messages\"},{\"key\":\"O\",\"desc\":\"Microsoft Outlook\"},{\"key\":\"P\",\"desc\":\"Proton Mail\"},{\"key\":\"Q\",\"desc\":\"QSpace Pro\"},{\"key\":\"S\",\"desc\":\"Safari\"},{\"key\":\"T\",\"desc\":\"Microsoft Teams\"},{\"key\":\"V\",\"desc\":\"VS Code Insiders\"},{\"key\":\"W\",\"desc\":\"Microsoft Word\"}],\"widthHintPx\":253}')"

rules.ruleDescription: CTRL+OPT+ESC - Activity Monitor (tap) or Force Quit (tap-tap)
